codes.title: Success
codes.explain: Operation completed successfully.

codes.title: Wallet Not Whitelisted
codes.explain: This wallet is not registered in the compliance system.

codes.title: Wallet Revoked
codes.explain: This wallet has been permanently revoked from the system.

codes.title: Claims Expired
codes.explain: The compliance claims for this wallet have expired.

codes.title: Lockup Period Active
codes.explain: This wallet is in a lockup period and cannot transfer tokens.

codes.title: Destination Not Accredited
codes.explain: The destination wallet is not accredited for REG_D transfers.

codes.title: Source Not Accredited
codes.explain: The source wallet is not accredited for REG_D transfers.

codes.title: REG_S US Person Restricted
codes.explain: REG_S tokens cannot be transferred to US persons.

codes.title: Unknown Partition
codes.explain: The specified partition is not recognized.

codes.title: Partition Cross Not Allowed
codes.explain: Cross-partition transfers are not permitted.

codes.title: System Paused
codes.explain: The system is currently paused and operations are restricted.

codes.title: Account Frozen
codes.explain: This wallet is temporarily blocked by compliance.

codes.title: Insufficient Balance
codes.explain: The wallet does not have enough tokens for this operation.

codes.title: Amount Must Be Positive
codes.explain: The transfer amount must be greater than zero.

codes.title: Reason Code Required
codes.explain: A reason code is required for this operation.

codes.title: Underfunded Full Mode
codes.explain: Insufficient USDC funding for full distribution mode.

codes.title: Invalid Snapshot
codes.explain: The specified snapshot ID is invalid or not found.

codes.title: Already Distributed
codes.explain: This snapshot has already been distributed.

codes.title: Invalid Day
codes.explain: The specified day is outside the valid range.

codes.title: Zero Root
codes.explain: The Merkle root cannot be zero.

codes.title: Invalid Recipient
codes.explain: The recipient address is invalid or not provided.

codes.title: Invalid Addresses
codes.explain: One or more addresses are invalid or not provided.

codes.title: Invalid Address
codes.explain: The provided address is invalid.

codes.title: Simulation Failed
codes.explain: Preflight simulation failed due to an error.

codes.title: Unknown Action
codes.explain: The specified action type is not recognized.
